Literature.Title: Modification and Synergistic Studies of a Novel Frog Antimicrobial Peptide against Pseudomonas aeruginosa Biofilms.
Literature.Author: Liu X, Shi D, Cheng S, Chen X, Ma C, Jiang Y, Wang T, Chen T, Shaw C, Wang L, Zhou M

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=16µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MBC=32µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 12493(MIC=>128µM),Enterococcus faecalis NCTC 12697(MIC=>128µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MIC=64µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MBC=128µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 43816(MIC=128µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 43816(MBC=128µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=32µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MBC=128µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC BAA-747(MIC=>128µM),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=>128µM)
